instructions:
Preheat an air fryer to 360 degrees F (180 degrees C). Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Lightly grease a large casserole dish.
Place frozen chicken pieces in the basket of the air fryer in a single layer. Air fry until golden, about 13 minutes. You may have to work in batches.
Meanwhile, place mozzarella cheese slices between parchment paper and roll thin with a rolling pin; set aside.
Pour half of marinara sauce into the prepared casserole dish.
Place the casserole dish in the preheated oven to warm the sauce, about 5 minutes. Remove from oven; nestle chicken tenders into the sauce. If desired, spread remaining marinara sauce over tenders. Place cheese slices evenly over top of casserole.
Bake until cheese is golden and melted, about 15 minutes. Add cut basil strips to the top for garnish. Serve immediately.
author: TheDailyGourmet
description: This easy mozzarella chicken is made with air-fried frozen chicken tenders, jarred marinara, and mozzarella cheese. Baked until bubbly, it's an easy family-friendly dish.
title: Easy Mozzarella Chicken
instructions_list: Preheat an air fryer to 360 degrees F (180 degrees C). Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Lightly grease a large casserole dish.
Place frozen chicken pieces in the basket of the air fryer in a single layer. Air fry until golden, about 13 minutes. You may have to work in batches.
Meanwhile, place mozzarella cheese slices between parchment paper and roll thin with a rolling pin; set aside.
Pour half of marinara sauce into the prepared casserole dish.

Place the casserole dish in the preheated oven to warm the sauce, about 5 minutes. Remove from oven; nestle chicken tenders into the sauce. If desired, spread remaining marinara sauce over tenders. Place cheese slices evenly over top of casserole.
Bake until cheese is golden and melted, about 15 minutes. Add cut basil strips to the top for garnish. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 (3 pound) package chicken tenders (such as Just Bare
sliced fresh basil leaves, for garnish
